Example 1:

intros d H.
assert (dta_correct (udta_conv_0 d)).
{ unfold dta_correct.

  rewrite Heq1 in Heq2.
  apply u_conv_0_invar_5 in Heq2.

  rewrite Heq3 in Heq4.
  apply u_conv_0_invar_8 in Heq4.

  rewrite Heq5 in Heq6.

  rewrite Heq7 in Heq8.
  rewrite u_conv_disj with (p0 := udta_conv_0 d) (a0 := a0) (s0 := s0) (p1 := udta_conv_0 d) (a1 := a1) (s1 := s1).
  rewrite u_merge_0 with (p0 := udta_conv_0 d) (p1 := udta_conv_0 d) (a := a0).
  rewrite u_merge_0 with (p0 := udta_conv_0 d) (p1 := udta_conv_0 d) (a := a1).
  simpl.
  auto. }
apply dta_correct with (d := udta_conv_0 d).
Qed.
